snippet.title: [PC] Smoke Attack (2002) Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Title: Smoke Attack
Developer: Phenomedia
Publisher: Swiss Federal Office of Public health
Release Date: May 2002
Platform: PC

In this smoking-risk awarenesss game from the swiss federal office of public health, you are navigating the character "Oxy" through offices. You can fight the aggressive smoking balls and the cigarettes by shooting them with your oxygen gun. There are a lot of extra ammunitions, secret weapons and keys hidden in the office. Find and use them! Your goal is to reach the next level and fight even more smoke.

The walkthrough of this arcade done on IBM ThinkPad A31 (P-IV 1,8 GHz, 512 MB RAM, Mobility Radeon 7500 32 MB. Sometimes there are small slowdowns during gameplay because of pretty low specs of my notebook for recording software, sorry for that. Enjoy and subscribe!

For maps of all 15 game levels look here - http://www.margotbean.com/Gaming/Walkthroughs/SmokeAttack/Smoke%20Attack%20Maps.htm

Level startpoints:
00:07 - Level 1
02:54 - Level 2
09:02 - Level 3
15:27 - Level 4
28:45 - Level 5
37:25 - Level 6
50:12 - Level 7
58:41 - Level 8
1:07:09 - Level 9
1:26:37 - Level 10
1:45:59 - Level 11
1:56:44 - Level 12
2:19:21 - Level 13
2:27:44 - Level 14
2:33:49 - Level 15
